Title: Develop the economy, guarantee supplies
Designer: Haidian District Revolutionary Committee Yangfangdian Street Central Primary School (海淀区革命委员会羊坊店街道中心小学), Beijing
Publisher: Beijing renmin chubanshe (北京人民出版社)
Notes: The slogan in the factory hall calls for studying Daqing and following 'the Daqing road'.The text on the worker's apron: 抓革命促生产 - Grasp revolution, increase production.
